Example Jupyter Notebooks

This section provides exemplary Jupyter notebooks demonstrating how to programmatically explore CAS-data (.xmi files) from our corpora.

Each notebook will show:

  • How to query data using Python
  • How to extract annotations from CAS (.xmi)
  • How to visualize linguistic features and learner progress

Verb Placement in Learner German

Analyze verb-final and verb-second constructions across corpora. Includes tree visualizations and token frequency analysis.

Compare Corpora by Modality

Aggregate learner corpora by modality and task type. Visualize distributions using bar and pie charts.

Custom CAS Querying

Learn how to programmatically load .xmi files, extract features, and build custom datasets from annotated corpora.
